extension.summary: Automatic start/shutdown of projectors connected by serial port
extension.description:
Control a serial port connected projector from Kodi. See https://github.com/fredrik-eriksson/kodi_projcontrol for a list of supported projectors. If your projector is missing, please create a github issue with link to the projector API documentation.
* Start/shutdown projector at kodi start/exit * Start/shutdown projector at Kodi screensaver activation/deactivation * Set input source when projector starts * Automatically update media library while the projector is off * Optional REST API to control the projector from any networked device.
